alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 12:54PM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Occasional snow and southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph at times. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with localized amounts up to 10 inches expected. * WHERE...Above 5500 feet through tonight, then above 4000 feet on Saturday. * WHEN...Until 10 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times due to fog and blowing snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
